entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle early in the morning. Showers beginning in the morning. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 4.
